Other brands is the result of our complementary brand range to our essential portfolio category, with a long-term strategy to centralize in fewer brands a broader portfolio range. segmented into two diferrent groups: 1) regional brands which role is to defend a volume in consolidated markets (viña sol, altos ibéricos, san valentín & coronas). 2) tactical brands which purpose is to maintain their volume while being transitioned to lead brands in the medium / long term.
